column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Portions are huge.  But unlike other steakhouses
column2: the gregarious servers don't try to upsell you.  Instead
column3: they explain portion sizes and suggest sharing appetizers
column4: entrees and sides.  And if you do share
column6: e.g. the $70 steak is $35 per person ... and there might still be steak left to take home.
